record.name: error
record.description: The error parameter's value is a Token that is a proxy error type. When present, it indicates that the intermediary encountered an issue when obtaining this response.

record.name: next-hop
record.description: The next-hop parameter's value is a String or Token that identifies the intermediary or origin server selected (and used, if contacted) to obtain this response. It might be a hostname, IP address, or alias.

record.name: next-protocol
record.description: The next-protocol parameter's value indicates the Application-Layer Protocol Negotiation (ALPN) protocol identifier of the protocol used by the intermediary to connect to the next hop when obtaining this response.

record.name: received-status
record.description: The received-status parameter's value indicates the HTTP status code that the intermediary received from the next-hop server when obtaining this response.

record.name: details
record.description: The details parameter's value is a String containing additional information not captured anywhere else. This can include implementation-specific or deployment-specific information.

record.name: dns_timeout
record.description: The intermediary encountered a timeout when trying to find an IP address for the next-hop hostname.

record.name: dns_error
record.description: The intermediary encountered a DNS error when trying to find an IP address for the next-hop hostname.

extra.paragraph: - rcode: A String conveying the DNS RCODE that indicates the error type. See , Section 3.
- info-code: An Integer conveying the Extended DNS Error Code INFO-CODE. See .

record.name: destination_not_found
record.description: The intermediary cannot determine the appropriate next hop to use for this request; for example, it may not be configured. Note that this error is specific to gateways, which typically require specific configuration to identify the "backend" server; forward proxies use in-band information to identify the origin server.

record.name: destination_unavailable
record.description: The intermediary considers the next hop to be unavailable; e.g., recent attempts to communicate with it may have failed, or a health check may indicate that it is down.

record.name: destination_ip_prohibited
record.description: The intermediary is configured to prohibit connections to the next-hop IP address.

record.name: destination_ip_unroutable
record.description: The intermediary cannot find a route to the next-hop IP address.

record.name: connection_refused
record.description: The intermediary's connection to the next hop was refused.

record.name: connection_terminated
record.description: The intermediary's connection to the next hop was closed before a complete response was received.

record.name: connection_timeout
record.description: The intermediary's attempt to open a connection to the next hop timed out.

record.name: connection_read_timeout
record.description: The intermediary was expecting data on a connection (e.g., part of a response) but did not receive any new data in a configured time limit.

record.name: connection_write_timeout
record.description: The intermediary was attempting to write data to a connection but was not able to (e.g., because its buffers were full).

record.name: connection_limit_reached
record.description: The intermediary is configured to limit the number of connections it has to the next hop, and that limit has been exceeded.

record.name: tls_protocol_error
record.description: The intermediary encountered a TLS error when communicating with the next hop, either during the handshake or afterwards.
record.notes: Not appropriate when a TLS alert is received; see tls_alert_received.

record.name: tls_certificate_error
record.description: The intermediary encountered an error when verifying the certificate presented by the next hop.

record.name: tls_alert_received
record.description: The intermediary received a TLS alert from the next hop.

extra.paragraph: - alert-id: An Integer containing the applicable value from the TLS Alerts registry. See .
- alert-message: A Token or String containing the applicable description string from the TLS Alerts registry. See .

record.name: http_request_error
record.description: The intermediary is generating a client (4xx) response on the origin's behalf. Applicable status codes include (but are not limited to) 400, 403, 405, 406, 408, 411, 413, 414, 415, 416, 417, and 429.

extra.paragraph: - status-code: An Integer containing the generated status code.
- status-phrase: A String containing the generated status phrase.

record.notes: This type helps distinguish between responses generated by intermediaries from those generated by the origin.

record.name: http_request_denied
record.description: The intermediary rejected the HTTP request based on its configuration and/or policy settings. The request wasn't forwarded to the next hop.

record.name: http_response_incomplete
record.description: The intermediary received an incomplete response to the request from the next hop.

record.name: http_response_header_section_size
record.description: The intermediary received a response to the request whose header section was considered too large.
record.extra: - header-section-size: An Integer indicating how large the received headers were. Note that they might not be complete; i.e., the intermediary may have discarded or refused additional data.

record.name: http_response_header_size
record.description: The intermediary received a response to the request containing an individual header field line that was considered too large.

extra.paragraph: - header-name: A String indicating the name of the header field that triggered the error.
- header-size: An Integer indicating the size of the header field that triggered the error.

record.name: http_response_body_size
record.description: The intermediary received a response to the request whose body was considered too large.
record.extra: - body-size: An Integer indicating how large the received body was. Note that it may not have been complete; i.e., the intermediary may have discarded or refused additional data.

record.name: http_response_trailer_section_size
record.description: The intermediary received a response to the request whose trailer section was considered too large.
record.extra: - trailer-section-size: An Integer indicating how large the received trailers were. Note that they might not be complete; i.e., the intermediary may have discarded or refused additional data.

record.name: http_response_trailer_size
record.description: The intermediary received a response to the request containing an individual trailer field line that was considered too large.

extra.paragraph: - trailer-name: A String indicating the name of the trailer field that triggered the error.
- trailer-size: An Integer indicating the size of the trailer field that triggered the error.

record.name: http_response_transfer_coding
record.description: The intermediary encountered an error decoding the transfer coding of the response.
record.extra: - coding: A Token containing the specific coding (from the HTTP Transfer Coding Registry) that caused the error.

record.name: http_response_content_coding
record.description: The intermediary encountered an error decoding the content coding of the response.
record.extra: - coding: A Token containing the specific coding (from the HTTP Content Coding Registry) that caused the error.

record.name: http_response_timeout
record.description: The intermediary reached a configured time limit waiting for the complete response.

record.name: http_upgrade_failed
record.description: The process of negotiating an upgrade of the HTTP version between the intermediary and the next hop failed.

record.name: http_protocol_error
record.description: The intermediary encountered an HTTP protocol error when communicating with the next hop. This error should only be used when a more specific one is not defined.

record.name: proxy_internal_response
record.description: The intermediary generated the response itself without attempting to connect to the next hop.
record.code: The most appropriate status code for the response

record.name: proxy_internal_error
record.description: The intermediary encountered an internal error unrelated to the origin.

record.name: proxy_configuration_error
record.description: The intermediary encountered an error regarding its configuration.

record.name: proxy_loop_detected
record.description: The intermediary tried to forward the request to itself, or a loop has been detected using different means (e.g., ).
